translation.en: [Ives] Well?
So, while we were giving the lab tour, I looked down at my phone
translation.ko: "세라 아이브스 - 수석 연구원 디스트리뷰티드 바이오" 연구실 투어 중에 휴대폰을 확인했더니

translation.en: and noticed that that email had come in.
translation.ko: 기다리던 이메일 답장이 왔더라고 "제이크 글랜빌 박사 디스트리뷰티드 바이오 CSO"

translation.en: [Ives] We're opening the Gates email.
No matter what, uh...
if we don't get it...
If we don't get it... The possibilities are we don't get it
translation.ko: 가능성은 셋 중 하나야 못 받거나

translation.en: or we get it but it's different than what we thought or--
-I think we should just open the email. -All right, let's just do it.
translation.ko: - 그냥 열어보는 게 어때? - 그래, 그러자

translation.en: Tear off the Band-Aid. Let's see.
translation.ko: 매도 빨리 맞는 게 낫지 어디 보자...

translation.en: "Grand Challenges universal vaccine developments full proposal...
translation.ko: '그랜드 챌린지 공통 백신 개발 제안서에 대해 검토한 결과...'

translation.en: congratulate you on being selected to move forward. [chuckles]
This is a very competitive process.
We're excited to work with you more closely on your project.
Program officer and program fully funded."
[chuckles] I've been waiting nine years for this.
[Ives] We heard back, and...
-it's yes. -[all applaud]
[Ives] Let's do a Champagne toast.
translation.ko: 샴페인으로 자축하자 내가 나가면 연기 좀 하다가

translation.en: -I'll tell everybody. -[woman 1 chuckles] Yeah, sure.
[woman 2] Are you happy? Happy.
[Glanville] Yeah, I am happy. I'm fucking stoked.
translation.ko: - 정말 잘 됐잖아 - 당연히 기분 좋지 - 그러니까 - 기분 째져

translation.en: We've won the grant,
and that gives me the optimism
to be able to move forward without worrying about funding.
translation.ko: 자금 걱정 없이 연구를 진행할 수 있으니까요

translation.en: [Ives] To our piggies.
[woman 2] To the piggies.
[Glanville] Right now, I feel confident, but a little antsy.
We need to finish the job
with the latest test of our flu vaccine and our pigs in Guatemala.
translation.ko: 과테말라에 있는 돼지들한테 투여한 독감 백신 결과를 봐야죠

translation.en: Cheers.
[Holly Goracke] Take another deep breath.
[Goracke] And again.
[Goracke] So the swab can tell us if it's the flu.
translation.ko: 표본 검사로 독감 여부가 판단될 거예요

translation.en: It's pretty accurate but it can... You know, we can miss a couple of cases.
translation.ko: 검사가 대체론 정확한데 가끔 아닌 경우도 있어요

translation.en: They said that you'd been tested last week or that you'd been sick last week.
translation.ko: "홀리 고라키 내과의, 의료과장" 지난주에도 아파서 검사받았다던데

translation.en: -But it came back negative... -[man] Right.
[Goracke] As the flu season kind of wears on,
we're busier and we're having sicker patients.
translation.ko: 진료실은 더 바빠지고 더 아픈 환자로 가득합니다

translation.en: We get tired and we're really looking forward
translation.ko: 의료진들도 많이 지쳐서 얼른 독감 유행철이

translation.en: to the end of flu season.
While I was working, the chills hit...
and I started feeling worse and then the coughing hit.
And then we did the flu swab and it was negative.
translation.ko: 그래서 면봉 검사를 해봤는데 음성 반응이 나왔죠

translation.en: So I'm like, "I'm fine. I'll just wear a mask." And I kept working.
translation.ko: 그래서 마스크 쓰고 일하면 괜찮겠거니, 계속 진찰을 봤어요

translation.en: That was on a Monday afternoon.
Draw labs and get an IV and we'll run his urine...
translation.ko: 혈액 채취하고 정맥주사 놔주면 소변 검사해서...

translation.en: My shift was Monday through Thursday morning.
So I knew this was early on. I have to just push.
translation.ko: 아직 한 주의 초반이어서 참아야 했죠

translation.en: He'll probably get a chest X-ray, too.
I decided...
Tuesday afternoon that I would test myself again,
and I was positive for the flu.
It shocks me every time I get the flu how much it hurts.
translation.ko: 매번 독감에 걸릴 때마다 얼마나 고통스러운지 놀랍네요

translation.en: The muscle aches and joint pain
and the bad headache and just coughing and feeling so tired,
but still feeling too miserable to even sleep.
translation.ko: 근데 잠들기엔 또 너무 괴로운 거죠

translation.en: I get the flu shot because I want to protect myself as much as possible,
translation.ko: 제 몸을 최대한 지키고 싶어서 저는 독감 주사를 맞아요

translation.en: but with the flu shot, it's not 100%.
translation.ko: 하지만 주사만 맞아서는 100% 예방이 안 돼요

translation.en: I tell my patients that they need good rest and they need to eat healthy.
translation.ko: 잘 쉬고 잘 먹어야 한다고 저는 환자에게 조언해요

translation.en: "You need to make sure you're balancing your life. Don't work too much."
translation.ko: 과로하지 말고 균형 있는 생활을 하라 해놓고

translation.en: And I think that I just don't follow my own advice.
translation.ko: 그 조언을 막상 전 안 따랐네요

translation.en: I don't get enough sleep, and I'm very stressed in my position.
translation.ko: 저는 잠도 충분히 못 자고 스트레스가 많은 자리에 있죠

translation.en: It does put me at a place where I'm at risk for having more illness.
translation.ko: 병이 걸릴 확률이 높은 생활을 하는 거예요

translation.en: Probably, I'm putting myself at risk for having a heart attack and stroke
translation.ko: 이렇게 살다 보면 심근경색 뇌졸중, 고혈압이 올 확률이

translation.en: and high blood pressure,
but that's the nature of the job.
[news anchor] There has been a rise in swine flu cases across India this winter season,
translation.ko: 올겨울, 인도 전역에 걸쳐 돼지독감 환자가 증가했고

translation.en: and Rajasthan is where the impact has been felt the most.
Are you seeing an increase in patients this year?
Definitely. There is a huge increase.
[news anchor] Authorities say that the sharpest spike in swine flu cases was seen last week.
translation.ko: 당국에 따르면 돼지독감 환자가 지난주에 급증했다고 합니다

translation.en: The numbers are staggering.
Over 9,000 people are affected,
which means that once it reaches that level again,
translation.ko: 그 말인즉슨, 그 수준에 또 도달했을 땐

translation.en: the spread will be that much faster.
So are enough measures being taken to restrict the spread of this disease?
translation.ko: 과연 전염병 확산을 막기 위해 충분한 조치를 취하고 있을까요?

translation.en: [in Hindi] So shift number five. There's an empty bed.
-Don't cough so loudly. -What else should I do?
-Cough normally. -[groans]
[Aggarwal] If you cough so loudly, it will hurt you.
translation.ko: 그렇게 기침을 크게 하면 몸이 아플 거예요

translation.en: I am hurting.
[Vijay] We have learned that every year
these two months are the most hectic.
translation.ko: 이 두 달이 가장 정신없다는 거예요

translation.en: We don't even see our own families.
No lunch or anything. There was no time.
translation.ko: 점심 먹을 시간도 없고 여유가 전혀 없어요

translation.en: But being a doctor is a passion.
I can work day and night.
[in English] Patients who are very, very sick, obviously it's very difficult.
translation.ko: 상태가 심각한 환자를 다루기란 쉽지 않습니다

translation.en: What if the patient does not make it?
You follow that patient from day one,
when you see that patient arriving in the Emergency.
Majority of the doctors get very attached to their patients,
translation.ko: 대부분의 의사는 환자에게 애착을 갖기 때문에

translation.en: and every time we lose a patient, it really hurts.
translation.ko: 사망 선고를 내릴 때마다 가슴이 아파요

translation.en: When Rajkumar came to us, he was very, very sick.
translation.ko: 라지쿠마르가 병원에 왔을 때 몸 상태가 매우 안 좋았어요

translation.en: [Vijay in Hindi] Take an X-ray for me now and send it to OPD.
When Rajkumar arrived at the hospital, he could hardly breathe.
translation.ko: 라지쿠마르는 입원했을 때부터 호흡이 거의 불가능했어요

translation.en: He was completely deteriorating.
When I attended to him, he was extremely hypoxic.
translation.ko: 진찰을 봤더니 혈중 산소가 심각하게 낮았고요

translation.en: [in English] Hypoxia means there is a lack of oxygen in your body.
His oxygen saturation was around 30-35%.
[in Hindi] We had to intubate him immediately and put him on a ventilator.
He was kept unconscious through sedation.
[in English] There is a lot of stress, whether he'll make it or not.
translation.ko: 라지쿠마르가 고비를 넘길 수 있을지 걱정이 많아요

translation.en: Although deep inside, they're very worried,
the family has full trust in us.
[man in Hindi] His children are getting married on the 9th and 10th of March.
But his health is more important now.
If he gets well, it's fine, or else we will try to postpone the wedding.
translation.ko: 회복하시면 그대로 진행하겠지만 아니면 결혼식은 미뤄야 하니까

translation.en: Let's see.
[Vijay] Get his X-ray sent to me in OPD.
We have to prone him at two o'clock, okay?
translation.ko: 오늘 2시에 복와위 자세로 바꿔야 해, 알겠지?

translation.en: Proning is a way of placing the patient.
If the patient is not getting sufficient oxygen from the ventilator
translation.ko: 등을 대고 누운 환자가 인공호흡기를 달았는데도

translation.en: when lying on his back, then we place him on his stomach,
translation.ko: 산소를 충분히 공급받지 못하면 엎드려 눕히는데요

translation.en: so that even his lower lung will open up with the pressure.
translation.ko: 복압을 증가시켜 폐 아래쪽이 열리도록 하기 위함이죠

translation.en: [in English] If after proning, his saturation is not improved,
translation.ko: 복와위 자세를 취해도 산소 포화도 수치가 오르지 않으면

translation.en: then it means his mortality is almost confirmed.
[Syra Madad] Being a Muslim, it shapes my daily life.
translation.ko: 제가 무슬림이란 사실은 제 생활 방식을 결정해요

translation.en: With our busy schedule these days,
translation.ko: "사이라 마다드 박사 뉴욕시 보건병원공사 전임 이사" 요즘 병원 일이 너무 바빠서

translation.en: it's hard to attend various programs, events or prayers,
translation.ko: 다양한 종교 행사나 예배 시간에 참석하기 힘들지만

translation.en: but I always try to make the time to go.
-Thank you. -[driver] You're welcome.
[announcer] Will everyone please come in close?
You can move in very close. People are gonna be joining us.
translation.ko: 바짝 들어오세요 많은 분이 더 오실 겁니다

translation.en: [Madad] I try to go to Jumu'ah or Friday prayers
at the NYU Islamic Center as much as I can.
translation.ko: 뉴욕대학교 이슬람 센터에서 열려서 최대한 참석하려 해요

translation.en: [announcer] Do you want to have the heart that feels and is awakened
translation.ko: 무언가 느끼고 깨어있는 마음을 가지고 싶다면

translation.en: with what they are going through...
[Madad] My faith drives me to do the work I do.
translation.ko: 제가 일할 수 있는 원동력은 제 신앙이에요

translation.en: And my desire is to not just help this community, this city, this nation,
translation.ko: 제가 하고 싶은 건 우리 지역 도시, 나라만을 위한 일이 아닌

translation.en: but the whole world.
But we're only as strong as our weakest link.
translation.ko: 근데 가장 약한 부분이 내 전체를 결정짓는다 하잖아요

translation.en: And that's why I'm starting a global health center.
translation.ko: 그래서 글로벌 보건 센터를 건립할 거예요

translation.en: To help the health care sector around the world to keep us all safer.
translation.ko: 공공의 안전을 위해 전 세계 의료 서비스를 강화할 목적이죠

translation.en: [announcer over PA] Attention please, this is a boarding call for Amtrak Crescent... [continues indistinctly]
translation.ko: 암트랙 크레센트 열차에 탑승하시는 승객은 지금...

translation.en: [Madad] We have no idea where the next patient zero will present.
translation.ko: 다음 최초 감염자가 어디서 나올지는 미지수예요

translation.en: So, for this global health center to work, I need to recruit professionals
translation.ko: 그래서 글로벌 보건 센터를 잘 운영하기 위해서

translation.en: from throughout the health care sector.
The best and the brightest for my leadership board,
translation.ko: 이사진에 영입할 최고의 인재를 모시기 위한 과정의

translation.en: and I'm starting that process in Washington, DC.
[Glanville] Let's do this.
We're gonna finally learn the results from the third pig study.
translation.ko: 세 번째 돼지 실험의 결과가 드디어 나왔어요

translation.en: Let's take a seat.
Worst-case scenario, which is still a possibility,
translation.ko: 최악의 경우도 안 일어난다는 보장이 없죠

translation.en: is that nothing worked,
and so we're stuck in the second experiment.
translation.ko: 두 번째 실험 결과에 여전히 머물러 있는 거예요

translation.en: So I'm hoping that we see a real improvement with the Centivax.
translation.ko: 그래서 센티백스 효능이 좋아졌다는 결과를 바랍니다

translation.en: So I have data to present from the vaccine study in Guatemala.
translation.ko: 과테말라 백신 연구 결과를 화면으로 보여줄게요 "크리스티나 페터스 디스트리뷰티드 바이오 연구원"

translation.en: This is just showing you that there were 35 pigs in the study.
Five pigs in each category.
This shows that if there is signal,
if there is binding, you see a curvature that goes upwards.
translation.ko: 효과가 있었을 때 곡률이 상승하는 걸 알 수 있어요

translation.en: -You're killing me. What's the result? -Tell us.
translation.ko: - 그만 뜸 들이고 결론부터 말해줘 - 맞아, 얼른

translation.en: This is the table that summarizes all of the results.
translation.ko: 이건 실험 결과를 종합적으로 보여주는 자료예요

translation.en: They're categorized by the groups.
So, as you see, group one was the... [continues indistinctly]
[Ives] So I look at the screen. I'm seeing some green, and here green is good,
translation.ko: 화면을 보는데 녹색이 보였어요 그건 좋은 의미죠

translation.en: because green is the amount of response that we're seeing from the pigs.
translation.ko: 녹색은 돼지에게서 나타나는 반응의 척도를 의미합니다

translation.en: [Pettus] Seven had MPLA and so forth.
[Ives] These results are huge for us,
because we have a vaccine formulation
that takes less shots and gives a stronger response.
translation.ko: 더 큰 효과를 낼 수 있는 백신 제조법을 찾았으니까요

translation.en: So this is very successful.
The pigs are producing antibodies against different strains of flu virus.
translation.ko: 여러 유형의 독감 바이러스 항체가 돼지 체내에서 생성되고 있어요

translation.en: [Glanville] All right. Thanks, Christina.
All right, so good news.
The primary goal of the experiment succeeded.
Obviously, we need some tinkering still because this required three shots,
translation.ko: 물론 여전히 보완은 필요합니다 이건 세 번 투여했을 때 결과고

translation.en: and we want only one shot if possible.
We're excited about those results. We have new questions.
translation.ko: 결과는 굉장히 만족스럽지만 새로운 궁금증이 제기돼요

translation.en: Scientists look at success and ask, "What's on the other side?"
translation.ko: 과학자는 무언가 해냈을 때 '이면에는 뭐가 있지?'라며

translation.en: And additional questions.
From an outsider, it's not always obvious that we've achieved a victory.
translation.ko: 외부의 시선에선 성공이 확연하게 드러나지 않을 때도 있지만

translation.en: As for scientists, that's not how we see it.
We see, "Okay, one less thing to worry about
and there's new things we're gonna fight towards next,"
translation.ko: 맞서 싸울 새로운 문제가 더 남았으니까요

translation.en: but it's exactly those victories
and even more so, the new questions that really drive us.
translation.ko: 그 새로운 의문들 때문에 더욱 탐구하고 싶어져요

translation.en: The foundation of all good science
is that the work should work in other people's hands,
translation.ko: 내 손을 떠났을 때도 같은 결과를 내야 해요

translation.en: and so this gives us some winning groups to move forward
translation.ko: 그래서 효과를 본 대조군은 계속 실험을 진행할 거고

translation.en: and we've already gotten better than where we were before
so the study was successful.
-Cool. Thank you very much, Christina. -[man] Sweet. All right, magic.
[Glanville] Our success with our vaccine technology on top of the Gates Foundation money
translation.ko: 백신 개발도 성공적이고 게이츠 재단 보조금도 받기 때문에

translation.en: means we can begin a pilot study in the UK,
translation.ko: 영국에서 시범 연구를 진행할 준비가 됐어요

translation.en: where we're gonna further optimize,
and then the next step is it creates a flu shot so that people don't get sick.
translation.ko: 누구도 아프지 않게 독감 주사를 개발하는 게 다음 단계예요

translation.en: Our goal here is to create a flu shot
so that within a decade,
we're looking back and we think of flu as a disease of the past.
translation.ko: 독감을 사라진 질병으로 취급할 날이 오는 거예요

translation.en: I remember each pig and each group that they were in.
translation.ko: 각 돼지가 어느 대조군에 있었는지 기억나

translation.en: I'm like... [continues indistinctly]
[woman 1] You need to get rid of that information. I know.
-Just burned into your brain. -Yeah. I want to learn new cool stuff.
translation.ko: - 아주 뇌에 새겨졌네 - 나도 새로운 거 배울래

translation.en: [woman 1] Yeah, there's other things to put in there.
[woman 2] Sweet. Done.
I don't feel like I can sit down and just rest,
because I have these things that are kind of pending.
I have too many balls in the air right now.
Makes me a little anxious.
As a physician, we pour out, and pour out, and pour out,
and because we work long hours,
and because we lose sleep,
fatigue is really, really right there in front of us all the time.
I have a 72-hour shift,
and the toll that it takes on my body,
and on my emotions, and even on my spirit, is not something that I factored in.
translation.ko: 감정과 정신에까지 주는 타격은 제가 고려한 사항이 아니었죠

translation.en: Honestly, as a physician, you begin to sacrifice little things
like dinners and church services and baseball games.
translation.ko: 저녁 식사나 교회 예배 야구 경기 같은 일상을요

translation.en: -Come in, baby. -[Goracke] Hi.
-Are you ready to eat? -Yeah. If you've got it ready.
translation.ko: "마이크 고라키 홀리의 남편" - 먹을 준비 됐어? - 그럼, 차려놨으면 먹지

translation.en: [Goracke] One little sacrifice at a time,
and if we're not careful, we sacrifice our family over it or our marriage.
translation.ko: 조절하지 못하면 가족이나 부부 관계도 잃어요

translation.en: She did. I heard her say that.
I wish you'd got some sour cream.
[Goracke] Right there, on the table.
-In a little package. -Okay. I didn't see it.
translation.ko: - 소형 포장 되어있어 - 아, 못 봤어

translation.en: [Goracke] My husband and I have a very strong relationship,
but the last probably six months, I haven't been very nice.
-I'm sorry. I'm in your way. -[woman] No problem.
[Goracke] So our relationship has been suffering.
More arguments. Not really listening to each other.
translation.ko: 많이 다투고 서로 하는 말에 귀 기울이지 않았죠

translation.en: I know that what I do is important to me and, of course, my patients,
translation.ko: 제 일이 저와 환자에게 중요한 건 알지만

translation.en: but what am I doing to myself and my family?
translation.ko: 저와 가족에게 못 할 짓 하는 건 아닐까요?

translation.en: Is this really right?
[in Hindi] I don't leave home without praying first.
Even if I spend just a few minutes in my temple, I am content.
translation.ko: 기도에 단 몇 분만 할애해도 마음이 평온해지거든요

translation.en: Sometimes, I make a request to God,
"God, please help me with my patients."
Sometimes you put in 1,000% and still nothing happens.
Then I sit in my temple and ask for God's help.
translation.ko: 저만의 작은 신전에 앉아서 신께 도움을 청하죠

translation.en: I tell God, "I have made every effort. Nothing is happening.
God, please do something. Give me ideas."
And then I see that the patient is gradually improving.
I realized that when I ask God for help, he gives it to me.
translation.ko: 신께 도움을 청하면 들어주신다고 깨닫는 순간이죠

translation.en: [in English] This is the patient, Rajkumar.
[in Hindi] It seemed like he would pass away in one to two-and-a-half hours.
translation.ko: 1~2시간 반 안에 숨이 멎을 것 같았어요

translation.en: [in English] When we intubate and put on a ventilator,
it was the maximum ventilation.
Then we proned the patient.
[in Hindi] Three cycles of proning for 16 hours.
It is day ten for him, isn't it?
Please call his companions.
-How are you related to him? -[man] Brother-in-law.
-[Vijay] Mr. Rajkumar, look at him. -[man] You okay?
translation.ko: - 라지쿠마르 씨, 처남 보세요 - 좀 어때요?

translation.en: [Vijay] You recognize him?
I am telling Mr. Rajkumar, if he can be brave and is willing to cooperate,
translation.ko: 라지쿠마르 씨가 용기를 가지고 협조할 의향이 있으면

translation.en: then all these machines will be removed.
[man] Cooperate with the doctors. Don't be tense.
[Vijay] Now, your arms are weak because you were on a ventilator for ten days.
translation.ko: 열흘이나 인공호흡기를 달고 있어서 팔에 힘이 없을 거예요

translation.en: You don't have strength in your limbs like normal people do.
translation.ko: 팔다리 근력이 지금은 일반 사람 같지 않죠

translation.en: You have to bring that strength back,
and you have to show me how much power is in your breathing muscles.
translation.ko: 호흡할 수 있는 힘이 얼마나 되는지 보여주세요

translation.en: Now, you grasp my finger with your fist.
Tightly. Grasp it. Bravo!
Use more force.
He has the strength.
Now, listen to me.
I want to try taking him off the ventilator.
We reduced it from 100% to 30%.
But now the question is, can he live without the ventilator?
translation.ko: 이제 관건은 인공호흡기 없이도 생활할 수 있냐는 거죠

translation.en: We are trying that out today for the first time.
This will stay outside.
Outside.
Easy.
[Vijay] Breathe calmly.
Breathe calmly.
You have to breathe on your own now.
We have turned the ventilator off. It is not connected now.
translation.ko: 인공호흡기 전원을 꺼서 산소 공급이 안 되니까요

translation.en: Now, we can see your power by the saturation over there,
translation.ko: 저기 뜨는 산소 포화도가 호흡하는 힘을 보여주는데

translation.en: which shows how well you are breathing.
Pull his bed up at an angle of 90 degree. We'll see for two, four, six, eight hours.
[man] How long he can remain like this?
[Vijay] If I see that there's no problem for 12 to 13 hours,
then starting tomorrow, he will stay off the ventilator.
What is the saturation?
[nurse in English] 92, 93.
[Vijay in Hindi] Wow, that is great!
Do like this.
You have to use your strength continuously.
Bravo.
Okay?
I will send you home walking.
You will walk out of here.
Okay?
Show us your courage for six hours like this.
Okay?
Don't you want to go home? There's a wedding to attend.
Now, you have to dance in the wedding, okay?
When I say things like, "You have to dance in the wedding,"
then the patient feels it's not a doctor who's treating him,
translation.ko: 환자는 마치 주치의가 하는 말이 아니라

translation.en: but someone dear to him.
translation.ko: 소중한 사람이 하는 말 같다고 느껴요

translation.en: And his confidence in me increases.
translation.ko: 그럼 저는 환자에 대한 확신이 커지죠

translation.en: [man] We were very scared for ten days when he was unconscious.
translation.ko: 매형이 의식을 잃었던 열흘간 저희는 정말 두려웠어요

translation.en: We felt a bit relieved when he became conscious.
translation.ko: 의식을 회복했을 때 비로소 안심이 좀 되었죠

translation.en: We finally had some hope.
But until he is shifted from the ICU to the regular ward,
translation.ko: 하지만 중환자실에서 일반 병실로 옮겨지기 전까진

translation.en: we can't say anything yet.
[Madad] We have to go to the Dirksen entrance, so we're gonna have to maybe walk around.
translation.ko: 더크슨 건물로 가야 하니까 조금 돌아서 가야겠네

translation.en: We're in DC to meet with some high-profile individuals in the field of public health.
translation.ko: 공공의료계의 저명한 인사들을 뵈러 워싱턴 DC에 왔어요

translation.en: We have a meeting at APAJ.
Our purpose of meeting with these individuals
is to tell them that we've launched this new global health center.
translation.ko: 글로벌 보건 센터의 출범을 알리기 위해서예요

translation.en: [man] Thanks.
-Welcome. Glad you're here. -[Madad] Thank you.
And then also to have them as board members,
to really help leverage some of their network and connections.
translation.ko: 그분들의 인맥과 영향력을 십분 활용할 수 있겠죠

translation.en: -How are you? It's great seeing you. -[man] How are you? Nice to see you.
And also get their advice and recommendations
as we are looking to develop our strategic plan moving forward.
translation.ko: 센터 발전을 위한 운영 전략을 세울 수도 있고요

translation.en: We want to talk to you about some of the things that we're doing
translation.ko: 생물방어에 관해 진행 중인 글로벌 보건 센터에 대해

translation.en: in terms of bio-defense, our new global health center.
translation.ko: 말씀드리려고 오늘 뵙자고 했어요 "톰 대슐 사우스다코타 전 상원의원"

translation.en: There's infectious disease outbreaks every second, every day.
translation.ko: 전염병은 언제 어디서든 발병할 수 있죠

translation.en: So it's constantly all around us
and we just need to make sure that we have the structure in place
translation.ko: 그럴 사태에 대비해서 체계를 미리 구축하는 게

translation.en: to manage these types of cases.
Our focus really is on the front line
whether it is an H7N9, or seasonal flu, or Ebola.
translation.ko: "짐 블루먼스톡 수석 의료 기획장" 그게 조류독감이든 계절성 독감이든 에볼라든 간에요

translation.en: And in a pandemic situation, in a health care delivery system,
translation.ko: 그리고 범유행 상황 발생 시 의료 서비스를 제공해야 하는데

translation.en: we don't have the luxury of having a week or two months
to come out with the clinical guidance or some sort of program.
And so based on some of our findings,
we actually have launched a global health center.
It is geared towards preparedness to special pathogens and pandemics.
translation.ko: "론 클레인 - 에볼라 사태 백악관 총 책임자(2014~15)" 특수 병원체나 범유행 대응에 포커스를 두는 시설이죠

translation.en: We are looking to assist, you know,
health care delivery systems outside the United States
translation.ko: 미국 외 국가에서도 의료 전달 체계를 확립해서

translation.en: in terms of preparing for special pathogens
based on a lot of tools, resources and experience that we have here.
translation.ko: 저희가 가진 기기, 정보, 경험을 활용하는 거죠

translation.en: To turn back to you with a question,
as you are sharing your learnings and your recommendations,
what is your, um... way forward?
Have you got to a point where you have a game plan?
For example, the flu on call,
when we talked to CDC, that's something we are very interested in
translation.ko: 중대한 영향력을 고려했을 때 CDC와의 협력 및 시범 운영 등

translation.en: and partnering and piloting, given our significant impacts.
translation.ko: 좋은 관계를 맺는 방향으로 관심 있게 보고 있어요

translation.en: Other tools that we can also come up with are, like, flu forecasts
translation.ko: 또 독감 예보 서비스도 고려 중입니다

translation.en: and knowing when flu season's gonna peak
translation.ko: 언제 독감 유행철이 극에 달할지 알고

translation.en: or knowing when there'll be a more severe flu season,
translation.ko: 유독 심한 시기를 미리 예견할 수 있으면

translation.en: so we can get the three S's,
more staffing, making sure we have more space,
making sure we have adequate supplies.
So tools that can come from a health care delivery standpoint.
translation.ko: 즉, 의료 전달 체계에서 제공하는 자원이죠

translation.en: Probably the biggest scare is that if funding does not continue,
translation.ko: 저희가 가장 큰 우려는 지원금이 끊겨서

translation.en: that the system that we've built in place may not exist next year.
translation.ko: 여태껏 구축해온 시스템이 내년엔 사라질 수 있다는 점이에요

translation.en: [Klain] You're on point,
because our history with this as a country is
we have one of these incidents,
we invest very heavily in this sort of stuff,
and then we slack it.
We spend, you know, the equivalent of a half of an aircraft carrier
translation.ko: 항공모함 절반 정도의 비용만 생물방어에 투자하는데

translation.en: on bio-defense when issues involving bio-defense have been responsible
for far more deaths than all the wars put together in the last century.
translation.ko: 생물방어 사상자가 더 많은 게 실상입니다

translation.en: And we are looking at putting an advisory group together
translation.ko: 그래서 글로벌 센터 자문단을 구성할 예정인데

translation.en: on this global center, and we would love to have you be a part of it,
if you are interested.
I would love to be. I'd be honored to be a part of it.
Obviously, I'd be happy to help in whatever way you think I can.
translation.ko: 제힘이 닿는 방면으론 물심양면 돕고 싶네요

translation.en: This is an issue I care deeply about.
-It's an urgent need. -[Madad] Yeah.
And we obviously saw how close to the edge we have been.
-One time we're not gonna be that lucky. -Absolutely.
translation.ko: - 운 나쁘면 끝까지 갈 수도 있죠 - 물론입니다

translation.en: Right. To the future!
-[Ives] To Centivax! -To Centivax!
[Glanville] The victories that you get, they're important to celebrate.
translation.ko: 승리를 쟁취하면 그에 걸맞게 자축도 해야 해요

translation.en: That's what fuels us.
I had a career in the first world in the pharmaceutical industry,
where there's a focus on markets that have a lot of money.
translation.ko: 돈이 되는 시장에 집중적으로 투자하는 환경이에요

translation.en: But if we really are serious about creating cures,
translation.ko: 하지만 정말로 해결책 개발에 뜻이 있다면

translation.en: and vaccines can be cures, unlike many other types of medicine,
translation.ko: 다른 의약품과 다르게 백신은 해결책이 될 수 있으니까

translation.en: then we need to finish the job,
and the way to do that is to subsidize its release globally.
translation.ko: 그리고 전 세계적으로 배포하는 방법이 옳다고 생각해요

translation.en: [Ives] I always wanted to be a scientist.
I like the idea of science,
but I think I never really knew what that could mean.
translation.ko: 그 개념이 가지는 진정한 의미는 몰랐던 거 같아요

translation.en: I feel like I'm really able to make a difference
translation.ko: 정말로 세상에 변화를 줄 수 있을 것 같고

translation.en: and maybe surmount a problem that was previously insurmountable.
translation.ko: 불가능이라 생각했던 문제의 돌파구를 찾을 것 같아요

translation.en: [Glanville] Our success has been because I've a lot of brilliant people like Sarah,
translation.ko: 세라 같은 유능한 인재들이 모여서 가능한 일이었어요

translation.en: who are willing to go tackle these new classes of problems
and not be afraid of the past.
There are many scientists who said,
"Hey, you're never gonna get to the Moon. No one's done it before."
translation.ko: '달 착륙을 어떻게 해 전례 없는 일이야'

translation.en: And, luckily, there are always voices in humanity
who ignore voices from the past because,
ultimately, those voices will always be wrong
translation.ko: 그 우려의 목소리가 틀렸다는 게 밝혀졌죠

translation.en: because humans are moving towards a greater future.
translation.ko: 인류는 더 위대한 미래를 향해 나아가고 있으니까요

translation.en: That's it.
In order to maintain my health,
in order to find a lifestyle that I can balance,
translation.ko: 감당할 수 있는 생활 방식을 찾기 위해선

translation.en: I have to leave Jefferson County.
-[Mike] No? All right. -[Goracke] I don't think so.
I know that someone will come up behind me
and continue the work. I just decided it can't be me.
translation.ko: 분명 누군가 나타나겠지만 저는 그만하기로 맘먹었어요

translation.en: Nothing spectacular here, but you may work a little bit. Um...
translation.ko: 대단한 일은 없어도 일을 많이 하게 될 거예요

translation.en: Miss Reynolds is in 2C. She's a hip fracture. She is...
The bottom line is I can't continue to work
translation.ko: 이렇게 계속 일한다면 건강할 수 없어요

translation.en: 24, 36, 72-hour shifts and be healthy.
I think their plans are to bring in two doctors
translation.ko: 제 대타로 의사 선생님 두 분을

translation.en: to do what I was doing,
'cause the model's not working.
-Love ya. -Love you, too.
[Goracke] But truly, this is a great hospital.
It's a beacon for the community.
So that was really a difficult decision to make,
translation.ko: 그래서 이 병원을 떠나기로 한 건

translation.en: to leave Jefferson County Hospital.
My husband and I are going to work really hard on our relationship
translation.ko: 남편과 함께 관계 회복에 정말 힘쓸 거예요

translation.en: and reconnecting with each other.
Place is so pretty. She's beautiful.
translation.ko: 여기 정말 좋다 우리 아기 예쁜 거 봐

translation.en: I wanted to be "the guy."
translation.ko: 저는 해결사가 되고 싶다는 마음으로 살아왔어요

translation.en: I had the attitude that I could do it all,
translation.ko: 뭐든 해낼 수 있는 것처럼 행동했죠

translation.en: and I enjoyed doing it all for a while.
Now, that's come to an end for me.
translation.ko: 하지만 이제 그만둘 때가 온 거죠

translation.en: Can you give that to him?
And I fear that if other physicians in rural areas
translation.ko: 그리고 만일 다른 시골 지역의 의료인들도

translation.en: are experiencing the same sorts of stresses
and the same sorts of fatigue,
that rural medicine as a whole is going to be depleted.
It's gonna take a plan to be in place
and, now, I don't think we have that plan.
[Madad] Good morning, everybody. We'll go ahead and get started.
translation.ko: "미국 뉴욕 뉴욕시" 안녕하세요, 여러분 얼른 시작합시다

translation.en: The CDC estimates that flu has caused as many as 29.3 million illnesses,
translation.ko: CDC가 이번 철 독감 환자 규모가 최대 2,930만 명에

translation.en: 394,000 hospitalizations, and over 35,000 deaths just this season.
It has been a mild season, luckily for us, this year,
translation.ko: 올해 독감 피해는 다행히 그리 심하진 않았네요

translation.en: and from a city, state, and national perspective,
with flu activity decreasing generally all around,
we've opted to deactivate our system seasonal flu activation calls.
translation.ko: 계절성 독감 알림 시스템을 비활성화하기로 결정했어요

translation.en: So, with that, I would like to first express my thanks to everybody
translation.ko: 그래서 우선 여러분께 감사하단 말씀 드리고 싶어요

translation.en: that has been with us on a weekly basis
for this protracted and long seasonal flu activation.
translation.ko: 계절성 독감 유행철 동안 매주 함께 해주셔서요

translation.en: Thank you all for your time,
and we will see you next year in the next activation meeting.
translation.ko: 내년 대책 회의 때 뵙도록 하죠

translation.en: Take care, everybody.
Open your mouth. Ah. Good job. Just like that. Exactly.
translation.ko: 입 벌려, 잘하네 그대로 벌리고 있어

translation.en: -Go pick out his book. -Mommy, turn the lights off.
translation.ko: - 가서 읽을 책 골라 - 불 꺼줘, 엄마

translation.en: No, Omar's using his toothbrush right now.
Why are you sitting in the sink like that?
When I think about my two boys
and my little girl that's now on the way,
and the future that they'll have 10 to 15 years from now,
I want my children to grow up in a world
where they don't have to think about this as constantly as I do.
translation.ko: 질병을 걱정하지 않아도 되는 세상에서 살았으면 좋겠어요

translation.en: Failure to take this as a global crisis will have dire consequences.
translation.ko: 전 세계적인 문제로 취급하지 않는다면, 곤경에 빠질 거예요

translation.en: We're all in it together,
and the greater our complacency, the greater the crisis will be.
translation.ko: 안일한 태도를 유지할수록 위기는 그만큼 커질 겁니다

translation.en: [Vijay in Hindi] How are you, Mr. Rajkumar?
Okay, he's not getting a fever, right?
-[nurse] He had fever yesterday. -[man] About 99.
[Vijay] 99 is...
It never went above 99.
[Aggarwal in English] Rajkumar, it was a very gradual journey.
It was a very challenging case, very challenging case,
because he had come in a very bad state.
translation.ko: 입원 당시 상태가 워낙 안 좋았거든요

translation.en: [in Hindi] Our patient is much better after coming here.
[Vijay] I think he needs a little family support.
He's been alone for so long...
I'll move him into the ward today. He will be with you all in the ward.
translation.ko: - 오늘 일반 병실로 옮길게요 - 네 거기서 같이 계시면 돼요

translation.en: Keep pen and paper handy, so he can say what's on his mind.
translation.ko: 하고 싶은 말을 적을 수 있게 펜과 종이 준비해주세요

translation.en: He can write it out.
Because, look...
-He escaped from the jaws of death. -Yes.
Then, what's the problem?
If it's not destined,
even if you keep him within the ICU walls, you can't do anything.
translation.ko: 중환자실에 둔다고 해도 손쓸 방법이 없어요

translation.en: If it wasn't his destiny, then would he come this far?
translation.ko: 살 운명이 아니었으면 이렇게 오래 버텼을까요?

translation.en: So he'll stay in the ward for a couple of days.
translation.ko: 그러니까 앞으로 며칠간 일반 병실에서 지켜볼게요

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay?
[Aggarwal in English] On Sunday, I didn't come to the hospital,
but I tend to follow patients, so I called him...
translation.ko: 환자 경과를 지켜보는 편이라 전화를 했어요

translation.en: I called the resident on duty, and he told me that he's gone home
translation.ko: 그날 나온 레지던트에게 물어보니 환자가 퇴원했고

translation.en: and he was very happy.
So it was very, very satisfying.
He was so happy that he'll be able to attend his daughter's wedding.
translation.ko: 따님 결혼식에 참석할 수 있어서 정말 좋아하셨대요

translation.en: [Vijay in Hindi] Rajkumar basically stayed in the hospital for 22 days.
In my opinion, they should go all out.
He has a new lease of life.
[man] Dr. Vijay is a true doctor. He's excellent.
Dr. Vijay is more than a doctor. He is God's incarnation.
For us, he is that.
[in English] Yes.
[Vijay in Hindi] I try to save every case of swine flu.
translation.ko: 저는 모든 돼지독감 환자를 완치하려고 노력합니다

translation.en: But when you step into the battlefield,
you cannot win every battle.
[Aggarwal in English] There is still a lot to be done
regarding the swine flu.
The government is trying, the doctors are trying,
but considering the doctor-to-population ratio,
translation.ko: 하지만 인구 대비 의료진 수를 고려하면

translation.en: we still have a lot of things to be done.
-[Dennis] Peter, hey. -[Peter] Oh, hi, Dennis.
[Dennis] I thought maybe we could talk a few minutes about our visit to China.
translation.ko: 중국 방문에 대해 잠시 얘기할까 해서 걸었어

translation.en: And in particular, the graphic that...
At some point in time, there will be an event
where an emergent virus, like the 1918 virus,
will emerge and will spread around the world.
translation.ko: 갑자기 나타나서 전 세계에 퍼질 거예요

translation.en: And we're talking about the wellbeing of seven-plus billion people.
Policy makers and planners, global health leaders,
translation.ko: 이 문제를 심각하게 고민해야 하는 건

translation.en: they should be thinking about this in serious terms.
translation.ko: 정책 입안자와 기획관 그리고 세계 보건 전문가예요

translation.en: We have to be prepared.
We have to be vigilant.
So a little bit about core structure and what to expect, so this morning...
translation.ko: 오늘은 코어 구조와 예상 상황에 대해 간략히...

translation.en: [Vijay in Hindi] I am not one to back down.
Flu will be back again next year.
We will fight against it again.
